channel.title: Fear of a Spandex Dragon / Tentacled Dragon / Space Dragon
channel.description:
I've got shelves full of Call of Cthulhu, Star Frontiers/Traveller and Champions modules that I've never used.
I know Jason often uses World of Dungeons to run trad or OSR modules and Tom uses a variety of different indie games to run them:
What would you suggest for running trad modules from Cthulhu, Scifi or Champions (or other supers as I think I've some V&V sitting around too)?

item.dc:creator: @seanFsmith
item.description:
@seanFsmith wrote:

I’m a big fan of Cthulhu Dark for horror investigations — currently using it to get through Masks of Nyarlathotep and it’s holding up well.

If you are after a gamier system, The Cthulhu Hack has your back.

For SF, Offworlders is functionally WoDu in spaaace and plays nicely
